Regulation Name(s): Immunoglobulin (light chain specific) immunological test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VENTANA CD30 (Ber-H2) Assay using immunohistochemistry for detection of CD30 in formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of CD30 protein in formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue stained with a VENTANA BenchMark ULTRA instrument to aid in identifying classical Hodgkin lymphoma, anaplastic large cell lymphoma, and cutaneous T-cell lymphoma, interpreted by a qualified pathologist in conjunction with histological examination and clinical information.
